description: Try our easy to follow Mini Ricotta Tarts recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pie & tart,Pescatarian,Soy free,Mother's Day,Peanut free
name: Mini Ricotta Tarts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup cream cheese, at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Place the tartlet cases onto 2 baking trays.
Add egg yolks and sugar to a food processor. Process until mixture is pale and creamy. Transfer to a small bowl.

Add cream cheese, lemon rind and sugar to processor and process until smooth and creamy. Add ricotta and process until well combined. With motor running, gradually pour in egg mixture. Add almond meal and sultanas. Pulse to just combine.
Fill tartlet cases with cream cheese mixture. Bake for 15 -20 minutes until set. Remove and sprinkle with extra cinnamon sugar. Serve.
